node.display_long_description:
Who said exercise needs to be full of pain and misery? Not us!

We believe it’s easy to get fit and stay motivated when you enjoy your workout.

FitXR is bursting with Box and Dance workouts that you’ll love. We’ve got a class for every mood, goal and fitness level—all guaranteed to get you feeling sweaty and uplifted.

It’s time to join FitXR and say goodbye to ‘no pain, no gain’!

POWERED BY FUN
FitXR is packed full of workouts that you will love, not fear. Train alongside others and enjoy the inspiration of group workouts!

ANYWHERE. ANYTIME
Work out whenever and wherever you want. FitXR turns any place into your own state-of-the-art fitness studio!

NEW CLASSES ADDED REGULARLY
World-class workouts by the world’s top trainers. Every class has been designed to increase energy levels, burn calories and improve strength.

METRICS THAT PUSH YOU
Not confuse you. Easily track your performance in real-time. And for extra motivation, the class leaderboard adds a little healthy competition.

node.display_short_description: Expect high energy cardio workouts that use squats, dodges and punches to give a challenging but fun total body workout.

nodes.title: New Update: Introducing new Box environment and streak mode
nodes.body_text:
Today we're launching a new sky park-style boxing environment, amongst other new updates to FitXR.
 
When you next go to work up a sweat in a Box workout, you'll get to choose between a new Sky Park environment featuring an urban rooftop space with views of the city skyline, or the original FitXR studio environment.
 
We're also launching new features, including a new streak mode and the ability to adjust your glove alignment.
 
Training Mode vs. Power Mode
The streak system will involve choosing between Training Mode - where any successful cue punch count towards your streak, or Power Mode, where streaks can only be maintained with explosive punches.

Fits like a Glove
Our new glove adjustment feature gives you the ability to reposition your gloves to create improved calibration.
 
Improved Performance
Further updates include improved hit detection, a more accurate recording of statistics, and an enhanced class filter.

Happy exercising!

nodes.title: Track your fitness in FitXR!
nodes.body_text:
With more and more people turning to VR to stay active while at home, Oculus are rolling out a new feature to help you maximise results.

Oculus Move is a new platform feature that helps you track your calories burned and physically active minutes you play in any game or app, including FitXR. Set goals, check your progress and have fun while you work out.

The Oculus team have let us know that they’re rolling Oculus Move out gradually, so some Quest and Quest 2 users will have access to this platform feature starting today.

Find Oculus Move in your library!

node.internet_connection_name: 下载内容需要连接网络

node.reviewDescription: I love this game. I use it every day as part of my workout routine. it doesn’t feel like working out. I also love that there are group classes and you can actually win by scoring the most points. My only complaint would be that I have three other friends with oculus quest and there should be some type of way to invite them to a work out so that  we are working out together. Like create a private room. As of right now we could both pick the same work out at the exact same time and end up being in different classes.
